channel.title: Ecology on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Ecology on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: These Newly Discovered Cells Breathe in Two Ways
item.description: In a hot spring at Yellowstone National Park, a microbe does something that life shouldn’t be able to: It breathes oxygen and sulfur at the same time.
